column4: How do I open folder from root? Something like nautirus, dont remember the name :O
to run the file manager as root, gksudo nautilus <-- dangerous
Hi Again. You gave me a command to insert to fstab once. about how do change the rights on the vfat harddisk.. but I cant figure it out
defaults,utf8,umask=007,gid=46 are the options you'd put on the vfat partition
